original_title: Star bowler lauds full team performance in strong U19WC win

enhanced_data.enhanced_title: Zadran Hails Team Unity After Afghanistan Crush West Indies by 138 Runs
enhanced_data.seo_meta_description: Afghanistan's Wahid Zadran (3/36) credits teammates as dominant all-round display secures 138-run U19 World Cup win over West Indies in Windhoek.
summary_bullets: Afghanistan posted 262/6 with Osman Sadat (88) and captain Mahboob Khan (86) leading the charge
Wahid Zadran claimed 3/36 as West Indies were bowled out 138 runs short of the target
Afghanistan top Group D and face Tanzania next in their quest for Super Six qualification

original_title: Beardman, Edwards included for Pakistan T20Is; Maxwell, Ellis rested

enhanced_data.enhanced_title: Beardman, Edwards Earn Australia Call-Ups as Maxwell Rested for Pakistan T20Is
enhanced_data.seo_meta_description: Australia names 17-player squad for Pakistan T20Is with young guns Mahli Beardman and Jack Edwards in line for debuts while Glenn Maxwell gets rest before World Cup.
summary_bullets: Pace bowler Mahli Beardman (20) and allrounder Jack Edwards poised for international debuts after stellar BBL campaigns
Glenn Maxwell and Nathan Ellis rested ahead of T20 World Cup; Cummins, Hazlewood, and David recovering from injuries
Three-match T20I series in Lahore (Jan 29-Feb 1) serves as crucial preparation before World Cup opener against Ireland on Feb 11
